Container.Name: OpenRA
Container.Overview: Mudislanders Dockerfile for mounting OpenRA's dedicated server [br][br] OpenRA is a project that recreates and modernizes the classic Command & Conquer real time strategy games. We have developed a flexible open source game engine (the OpenRA engine) that provides a common platform for rebuilding and reimagining classic 2D and 2.5D RTS games (the OpenRA mods).
Container.Description: Mudislanders Dockerfile for mounting OpenRA's dedicated server [br][br] OpenRA is a project that recreates and modernizes the classic Command & Conquer real time strategy games. We have developed a flexible open source game engine (the OpenRA engine) that provides a common platform for rebuilding and reimagining classic 2D and 2.5D RTS games (the OpenRA mods).

Variable.Value: Welcome to Mudisle d2k Server. Have Fun!!
